Posts.Content: Hi Adele, i had all the side effects going during my 7 months of Chemo 4 years ago, but i am now on HerceptinÂ and only side effect i had was during my first cycle, really bad headache and shivers so the halted for 1 hour and i had hot drink and some pain killers and then the continued at a slower pace, , then i was very fatigued for next 2 days and flu like symptoms but all bearable, just had no 4 cycle and had a bad night with stomach pains right through to my back, going to ring hospital and ask if this is normal this far on in treatment, i am sure it is , and drugs that will postpone our lives we have to take if we want to survive dont you think, you will be fine just tell them you are very sensitive to all drugs and they watch you closely, take care, didley
Posts.Title: Worried about starting herceptin, what should I expect?
